dogs.short_description: Taking care of a pet is my favorite, it helps me to ease my mind.
dogs.long_description: Greyhounds are gentle, quiet and very affectionate dogs. They enjoy calm walks and relaxing with their owners, and they usually get along well with other dogs and people.

dogs.short_description: Taking care of a pet is my favorite, it helps me to ease my mind.
dogs.long_description: Dobermanns are loyal, intelligent and protective dogs. They form strong bonds with their families and are happiest when they have a job to do and regular mental and physical activity.

dogs.short_description: Taking care of a pet is my favorite, it helps me to ease my mind.
dogs.long_description: Pomeranians are small, fluffy and full of personality. They are playful, curious and love being the center of attention in the family.
